message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This product holds significant value to us, but we understand its potential worth to you is even greater at $10,000. We are offering this exceptional item to you for a special consideration price of $9,500. This is an opportunity to acquire a high-quality product at a price that is slightly below its perceived value by you, making it a favorable deal for both parties. Please let us know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
